survey.name: Survey
survey.res: You’ve entered a wrong numbers or alphabets. Please enter the correct number or alphabet again. You can try 2 more times.

Please fill in the answers in order, and fill in different answers.
Please review your response. You mentioned you have ${S7.val} child(ren) living at your household.

samplesource.invalid: You are missing information in the URL. Please verify the URL with the original invite.
samplesource.completed: It seems you have already entered this survey.

exit.cond: terminated and (QC2.r2 or checkQC.r2 or checkQC.r3 or checkQC.r5 or checkQC.r6 or S11.count ge 7)

samplesource.exit:
Thank you for your participation.
This survey contained questions that help ensure the accuracy and reliability of research results. In this instance it looks like these questions were not answered consistently or as instructed.
We encourage you to take your time, read questions carefully, and provide consistent answers to earn the full reward. For this survey you are still awarded for your contribution.

p.i:
Whoa, that was a little too fast!
You've completed the survey in less than XXXX minutes when it should take at least xxx minutes.
We were expecting you to take your time and read each question carefully. For this, survey we can only give you the minimum reward

Thank you for taking the time to participate in our online survey.
Unfortunately, you did not qualify for this research but will still receive the screening reward for your participation.
We look forward to contacting you in the near future with our surveys and special offers.

Thank you for taking the time to participate in our online survey.
We look forward to contacting you again with our surveys and special offers.

Thank you for taking the time to participate in our online survey.
Unfortunately, you did not qualify for this research but will still receive the screening reward for your participation.
We look forward to contacting you in the near future with our surveys and special offers.

samplesource.invalid: You are missing information in the URL. Please verify the URL with the original invite.

exit.cond: terminated and ((QC2.r2) or (samplingHouse.r6 and QHP.val not in ['',None]) or (checkQC.r2 or checkQC.r3 or checkQC.r4 or checkQC.r5 or checkQC.r6) or (S11.count ge 7) or (str(VFC1.val)=='Verificationfailed'))

samplesource.exit: Thank you for taking our survey.
Thank you for taking our survey.

That's the end of our survey. Thanks again for your time
Please close down your window to exit the survey.
Thank you for taking our survey.

radio.label: samplingHouse
radio.title: Record the sample source

radio.label: QCOUNTRY
radio.title: Record the Marketing (Country)
radio.comment: This is a hide question, will be auto hide during the FW.

radio.label: ratingOrder
radio.title: Record the order of the rating question
radio.comment: This is a hide question, will be auto hide during the FW.

checkbox.label: QCtree
checkbox.title: Record 2 sub QC questions from QC tree
checkbox.comment: This is a hide question, will be auto hide during the FW.

radio.label: QCtree1st
radio.title: Record 1st sub QC questions from QC tree
radio.comment: This is a hide question, will be auto hide during the FW.

radio.label: QCtree2nd
radio.title: Record 2nd sub QC questions from QC tree
radio.comment: This is a hide question, will be auto hide during the FW.

pipe.label: QCtree1stTitle
pipe.case: Please select "Strongly agree" from the list below. This is a quality check question.

pipe.case: Please select "Strongly agree" from the list below. This is a quality check question.
Please select "I'm fairly confident" from the list below. This is a quality check question.

survey.exec: checkQC.r1.val=1
p.timeS = timeSpent()
p.times1 = time.time()

text.label: VFC1
text.title:
Before you proceed to the survey, please complete the following security check question.
Please enter the text in the image.
If you can’t read text, please click on the image to refresh.
If you would like to hear the text read aloud, please click the speaker icon.

survey.html:
Welcome to our survey!
The survey will take a maximum of 10 minutes for you to complete. Please answer each question on your screen before proceeding to the next screen. If you require a break at any stage, you can close your browser and return to the survey at a later time. All you need to do to resume is return to the My Survey portal and the survey will be waiting for you.

radio.label: QWBIR
radio.title:
We believe in research
We want to remind you the company sponsoring this relies on the results to make key business decisions.Therefore, it’s very important that you provide considered and accurate responses.
You’ll notice simple questions unrelated to the survey topic, they’re part of our quality controls, to ensure you’re paying attention. If a respondent fails these questions, the survey may be treated as invalid.
Are you happy to co-operate with these quality controls and answer this survey accurately?

term.cond: not gv.isSST() and samplingHouse.r6 and QHP.val not in ['',None]

survey.html: Firstly, a few quick questions to make sure we're surveying a good cross-section of the population.

checkbox.label: S1
checkbox.title: Do you or any of your immediate family work in the following industries?

number.label: S2
number.title: Please type in your age in years:

radio.label: S3
radio.title: Are you...?

text.label: S4
text.title: Please type in your postcode:

radio.label: S2b
radio.title: Record the age group 1
radio.comment: This is a hide question, will be auto hide during the FW

radio.label: S2c
radio.title: Record the age group 2
radio.comment: This is a hide question, will be auto hide during the FW

radio.label: S4b
radio.title: Record the state
radio.comment: This is a hide question, will be auto hide during the FW

radio.label: S4c
radio.title: Record of GCCSA Region
radio.comment: This is a hide question, will be auto hide during the FW

radio.label: S4d
radio.title: Record of GCCSA
radio.comment: This is a hide question, will be auto hide during the FW

radio.label: S4e
radio.title: Record the RA
radio.comment: This is a hide question, will be auto hide during the FW

radio.label: S5
radio.title: Which of the following best describes the household you live in?
radio.comment: Please select the one answer that most applies.
radio.row: Live in a shared adult household
Live with my partner and children

row.label: r2
row.autofill: S5.r1 or S5.r2 or S5.r3 or S5.r4

radio.label: S6
radio.cond: S5.r1 or S5.r2 or S5.r3 or S5.r4
radio.title: Do you have children?

survey.exec: if S5.r1 or S5.r2 or S5.r3 or S5.r4: S7.val = 0

number.label: S7
number.title: How many children currently live in your household?

checkbox.label: S8
checkbox.title: Which of the following age groups do your children living at home fall into?

row.label: r1
row.autofill: (S2.check('16-22')) and (S5.r1 or S5.r2 or S5.r3 or S5.r4)

row.label: r2
row.autofill: (S2.check('23-35')) and (S5.r1 or S5.r2 or S5.r3 or S5.r4)

row.label: r3
row.autofill: (S2.check('>35')) and (S5.r1 or S5.r2 or S5.r3 or S5.r4)

radio.label: S9
radio.title: Which of the following best describes your highest level of education?
radio.row: Diploma or certificate from a college or TAFE including an apprenticeship
Degree of diploma from a university

radio.label: S10
radio.title: Which of the following groups does your total (pre-tax) personal annual income fall?

checkbox.label: S11
checkbox.title: Which of the following have you done in the past 12 months?
checkbox.row: Undergone an IVF cycle (Inc. egg retrieval &/or insemination)

survey.exec: S11_SUM.val=S11.count
if S11.count ge 7: checkQC.r10.val=1

number.label: S11_SUM
number.title: Record the number of options selected in QC7
number.comment: This is a hide question, will be auto hide during the FW

checkbox.label: TermAll
checkbox.title: Summary the respondents terminated place.
checkbox.comment: This is a hide question, will be auto hide during the FW

term.cond: S1.r1 or S1.r2 or S1.r3 or S1.r4

survey.term: Age less than 18 or greater than 64
survey.exec: p.times2= time.time() VAR_TIME_S.r1.val = ("%.2f" % ((p.times2- p.times1) / 60.0))

radio.label: tempQC1
radio.title: ${pipe.QCtree1stTitle}

survey.exec: QC1.val=0 if (QCtree1st.r1 and not tempQC1.r5) or (QCtree1st.r2 and not tempQC1.r4) or (QCtree1st.r3 and not tempQC1.r2) or (QCtree1st.r4 and not tempQC1.r5) or (QCtree1st.r5 and not tempQC1.r4) or (QCtree1st.r6 and not tempQC1.r2) or (QCtree1st.r7 and not tempQC1.r5) or (QCtree1st.r8 and not tempQC1.r4) or (QCtree1st.r9 and not tempQC1.r2): QC1.val=1

radio.label: QC1
radio.title: Record the 1st QC question answer correct or incorrect.
radio.comment: This is a hide question, will be auto hide during the FW.

pipe.label: QCtree1stText

case.label: r1
case.p:
Great! You passed the first quality check question! There will be more later in survey!
Thank you so much for paying attention to the survey. We value your considered and honest answers

pipe.case:
Unfortunately some of your recent answers indicate you may not be fully engaged in this survey. Please answer honestly as these questions are about "you" and your opinions and experiences.
Inconsistent or incomplete answers may result in this survey being cancelled and you will not be eligible to earn the credit you were offered for completion.

case.label: r3
case.p:
You have selected the incorrect answer to the previous question...
Which suggests you are not paying attention to this survey. The integrity of this research depends on your considered & honest answers.

If you fail the next quality check question,
you may not be provided the full incentive and may not be invited to complete future surveys.

survey.exec: sst.S.val= timeSpent() - p.timeS p.timeS = timeSpent()

checkbox.label: proglist_A
checkbox.title: All UNITS of Product.
checkbox.row: Food with Regional Australian callouts e.g. grown in Tasmania/Adelaide/South Australia
Australian Natives Ingredients: e.g. Wattleseed, Lemon Myrtle

checkbox.label: HidlistA
checkbox.title: Hidden Question
checkbox.row: Food with Regional Australian callouts e.g. grown in Tasmania/Adelaide/South Australia
Australian Natives Ingredients: e.g. Wattleseed, Lemon Myrtle

number.label: HidLoopOrderA
number.title: Hidden for storing concept order - hidden_q
number.row: Food with Regional Australian callouts e.g. grown in Tasmania/Adelaide/South Australia
Australian Natives Ingredients: e.g. Wattleseed, Lemon Myrtle

survey.exec: L1_expanded.order = HidlistA.rows.order
survey.html: We'd now like to ask you about the food and drink you may (or may not) have been eating or drinking recently. Some of the things we'll ask you about will be specific types of food or drink, whilst others will be types of diet, cuisine or ingredient.

select.label: A1_[loopvar: label]
select.title:
Thinking of the [loopvar:Var1] below, have you consumed it in the last month?
[loopvar: HidlistArows]

select.label: A2_[loopvar: label]
select.title:
Thinking of the [loopvar:Var1] below, do you hope to consume more or less of it in the next month?
[loopvar: HidlistArows]

select.label: A3_[loopvar: label]
select.title:
Thinking of the [loopvar:Var1] below, to what extent does it fit with your idea of the McDonald’s menu?
[loopvar: HidlistArows]
select.choice: It fits really well on the McDonald's menu
It fits fairly well on the McDonald's menu
I don't know/don't have an opinion
It doesn't fit that well on the McDonald's menu
It doesn't fit at all well on the McDonald's menu

select.label: A4_[loopvar: label]
select.title:
Thinking of the [loopvar:Var1] below, if it was added to, or featured more on the McDonald’s menu, to what extent would this impact your likelihood to go to McDonald’s?
[loopvar: HidlistArows]
select.choice: I'd be much more likely to go to McDonalds
I'd be somewhat more likely to go to McDonald's
I'd be somewhat less likely to go to McDonald's
I'd be much less likely to go to McDonald's

looprow.label: Lr11
looprow.loopvar: Food with Regional Australian callouts e.g. grown in Tasmania/Adelaide/South Australia

looprow.label: Lr31
looprow.loopvar: Australian Natives Ingredients: e.g. Wattleseed, Lemon Myrtle

survey.exec: sst.A.val= timeSpent() - p.timeS p.timeS = timeSpent()
p.times2= time.time() VAR_TIME_A.r1.val = ("%.2f" % ((p.times2- p.times1) / 60.0))

checkbox.label: proglist_B
checkbox.title: all items used in section B

number.label: HidLoopOrderB
number.title: Hidden for storing concept order - hidden_q

survey.exec: L2_expanded.order = HidlistB.rows.order
survey.html: We'd now like to ask you about burger ingredients you may (or may not have) been eating recently. The questions are similar to the previous section but in this case we want you to think about burgers only.

select.label: B1_[loopvar: label]
select.title:
Thinking of the burger ingredient below, have you consumed a burger with this ingredient in the last month?
[loopvar: HidlistBrows]

select.label: B2_[loopvar: label]
select.title:
Thinking of the burger ingredient below, do you hope to consume more or less burgers containing it in the next month?
[loopvar: HidlistBrows]

select.label: B3_[loopvar: label]
select.title:
Thinking of the burger ingredient below, to what extent does it fit with your idea of McDonald’s burgers?
[loopvar: HidlistBrows]
select.choice: It fits really well with McDonald's burgers
It fits fairly well with McDonald's burgers
I don't know/don't have an opinion
It doesn't fit that well with McDonald's burgers
It doesn't fit at all well with McDonald's burgers

select.label: B4_[loopvar: label]
select.title:
Thinking of the burger ingredient below, if it was added to, or featured more on the McDonald’s burger menu, to what extent would this impact your likelihood to go to McDonald’s?
[loopvar: HidlistBrows]
select.choice: I'd be much more likely to go to McDonalds
I'd be somewhat more likely to go to McDonald's
I'd be somewhat less likely to go to McDonald's
I'd be much less likely to go to McDonald's

survey.exec: sst.B.val= timeSpent() - p.timeS p.timeS = timeSpent()
p.times3= time.time() VAR_TIME_B.r1.val = ("%.2f" % ((p.times3- p.times2) / 60.0))
survey.html: The next section of this survey is all about your attitudes and behaviours towards different foods and drinks.

radio.label: SD1
radio.title: Do you tend to be the first to try new foods/drinks?

radio.label: SD2
radio.title: Do you read restaurant reviews at Broadsheet, Concrete Playground and/ or Urban List at least once a week?

number.label: SD3
number.title: How many food-related social media accounts do you follow?

radio.label: SD4
radio.title: Do you regularly write reviews on websites like Broadsheet, Concrete Playground and/ or Urban List?

radio.label: SD5
radio.title: Do people ask you for advice or recommendations on food/drinks or eating out at restaurants?

radio.label: SD6
radio.title: Is food an active interest of yours?

radio.label: SD7
radio.title: Do you enjoy creating meals or recipes using new and exciting ingredients?

radio.label: SD8
radio.title: How often do you buy and personally eat/drink items from McDonald’s?
radio.row: At least 5 times or more a week

radio.label: SD9
radio.cardsort:bucketCSS: background: -webkit-gradient(linear, 0% 0%, 0% 100%, from(#1a82f7), to(#2F2727)); background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, #fff, #E6E7E8); background: -moz-linear-gradient(top, #fff, #E6E7E8); background: -ms-linear-gradient(top, #fff, #E6E7E8); background: -o-linear-gradient(top, #fff, #E6E7E8); border-radius:15px; margin: 0px auto; padding:0px; color:#000; height:100px; line-height:15px; width:100px; font-size:12px; font-family:'Arial'; border: 2px solid #7D848D;
radio.cardsort:bucketHoverCSS: background: -webkit-gradient(linear, 0% 0%, 0% 100%, from(#1a82f7), to(#2F2727)); background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, #fff, #E6E7E8); background: -moz-linear-gradient(top, #fff, #E6E7E8); background: -ms-linear-gradient(top, #fff, #E6E7E8); background: -o-linear-gradient(top, #fff, #E6E7E8); border-radius:15px; margin: 0px auto; padding:0px; color:#000; height:100px; line-height:15px; width:100px; font-size:12px; font-family:'Arial'; border: 2px solid #7D848D;
radio.title: How often do you tend to buy and personally eat/drink the following types of food/drink from McDonald’s?
radio.row: Burger Classics, like Big Mac, Quarter Pounder, McChicken, Hamburger, Cheeseburger
'Select' Burgers, with high-quality, specially selected ingredients, like Angus Burger, Wagyu burger, Chicken Clubhouse, BBQ Bacon Lovers
Sides like fries, hash browns etc.
Breakfast items, like hotcakes, English muffins, brekkie rolls
Food from McCafé, like muffins, banana bread

radio.label: FlatLiner_SD9
radio.title: Hidden for flatliner

radio.label: SD10
radio.cardsort:bucketCSS: background: -webkit-gradient(linear, 0% 0%, 0% 100%, from(#1a82f7), to(#2F2727)); background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, #fff, #E6E7E8); background: -moz-linear-gradient(top, #fff, #E6E7E8); background: -ms-linear-gradient(top, #fff, #E6E7E8); background: -o-linear-gradient(top, #fff, #E6E7E8); border-radius:15px; margin: 0px auto; padding:0px; color:#000; height:100px; line-height:15px; width:100px; font-size:12px; font-family:'Arial'; border: 2px solid #7D848D;
radio.cardsort:bucketHoverCSS: background: -webkit-gradient(linear, 0% 0%, 0% 100%, from(#1a82f7), to(#2F2727)); background: -webkit-linear-gradient(top, #fff, #E6E7E8); background: -moz-linear-gradient(top, #fff, #E6E7E8); background: -ms-linear-gradient(top, #fff, #E6E7E8); background: -o-linear-gradient(top, #fff, #E6E7E8); border-radius:15px; margin: 0px auto; padding:0px; color:#000; height:100px; line-height:15px; width:100px; font-size:12px; font-family:'Arial'; border: 2px solid #7D848D;
radio.title: Please indicate how much you personally agree or disagree with each of the following statements.
radio.comment: Please select one answer per statement.
radio.row: I prioritise good health when making choices about food
Sustainability of ingredients and food processes are important to me and an influence on my food choices
I consider myself a food enthusiast, taking an interest in cooking, food trends and restaurants
The carbon footprint of ingredients and food processes are important to me and an influence on my food choices
Recycling is important to me and an influence on my food choices
Minimising food waste is a priority for me
I am actively reducing my meat intake

radio.label: FlatLiner_SD10
radio.title: Hidden for flatliner

checkbox.label: SD11
checkbox.title: Which of these restaurants have you eaten at in the past 3 months?

radio.label: SD12
radio.title: How often do you buy and personally eat/drink items from McDonald’s?
radio.row: At least 5 times or more a week

survey.exec: p.times4= time.time() VAR_TIME_D.r1.val = ("%.2f" % ((p.times4- p.times3) / 60.0))

radio.label: tempQC2
radio.title: ${pipe.QCtree2ndTitle}

survey.exec: QC2.val=0 if (QCtree2nd.r1 and not tempQC2.r5) or (QCtree2nd.r2 and not tempQC2.r4) or (QCtree2nd.r3 and not tempQC2.r2) or (QCtree2nd.r4 and not tempQC2.r5) or (QCtree2nd.r5 and not tempQC2.r4) or (QCtree2nd.r6 and not tempQC2.r2) or (QCtree2nd.r7 and not tempQC2.r5) or (QCtree2nd.r8 and not tempQC2.r4) or (QCtree2nd.r9 and not tempQC2.r2): QC2.val=1

radio.label: QC2
radio.title: Record the 2nd QC question answer correct or incorrect.
radio.comment: This is a hide question, will be auto hide during the FW.

pipe.label: QCtree2ndText

case.label: r1
case.p:
Great! You passed the 2nd quality check question!
Thank you so much for paying attention to the survey. We value your considered and honest answers

pipe.case:
You have failed the 2nd quality check question in this survey,
which means we can’t accept your answers
and you will not be provided the full incentive for completing this survey.

survey.exec: if QC2.r2: checkQC.r6.val=1

radio.label: QC4
radio.title: Did you encounter any issues with the survey?

checkbox.label: QC5
checkbox.title: Can you please specify what type of issues you encountered?
checkbox.row: Images are blurry, but I was still able to answer properly
Images are too blurry which has affected my answers
Images are not properly aligned, but I was still able to answer properly
Images are not properly aligned which has affected my answers

radio.label: QC3
radio.title: Finally, can we just confirm the following, please select true or false for each.

survey.exec: checkQC.r2.val=0 checkQC.r4.val=0 checkQC.r5.val=0 if QC3.r1.c2 or QC3.r2.c1: checkQC.r1.val=0 checkQC.r2.val=1 if timeSpent() lt 1: checkQC.r1.val=0 checkQC.r4.val=1 if QC5.r1 or QC5.r3 or QC5.r5 or QC5.r6: checkQC.r1.val=0 checkQC.r5.val=1

checkbox.label: checkQC
checkbox.title: RECORD QUILITY OR NOT FROM QC

survey.exec: if checkQC.r2 or checkQC.r3 or checkQC.r4 or checkQC.r5 or checkQC.r6: checkQC.r1.val=0

pipe.label: pipeFinalx0
pipe.case: Thank you for your valued opinion!
That's the end of the survey!

select.label: Finalx1
select.title: What was your overall experience of the survey?
select.comment: Drag the slider to a point on the scale.

textarea.label: Finalx3
textarea.title: We are keen to improve our surveys. Please let us know how we could have improved this survey for you?

radio.label: Finalx4
radio.title: Based on the results of this survey, we might be interested in conducting further research. Would you be interested in participating and us contacting you?
radio.row: Yes, I am happy to be contacted via email

radio.label: SC
radio.title: Speeder checks

survey.exec: sst.Z.val= timeSpent() - p.timeS p.timeS = timeSpent()

term.cond: not gv.isSST() and (checkQC.r2 or checkQC.r3 or checkQC.r4 or checkQC.r5 or checkQC.r6)
